scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-iadvize && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm run setup
